mapper.select: SELECT a.userCode, a.username, a.password, a.fullName, b.authorityCodeName FROM account_list a join account_authority b on a.authorityCode = b.authorityCode WHERE a.username = #{ username }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_list ( userName, password, fullName, nickName, birthday, email, phone, profileimg, authorityCode ) VALUES ( #{ username }, #{ password }, #{ fullName }, #{ nickName }, #{ birthday }, #{ email }, #{ phone }, #{ profileimg }, ( SELECT authorityCode FROM account_authority WHERE authoritycodename = 'USER' ) )
